original: @64b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @64b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Kṛṣṇayamārisādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Sādhana of Black Yamāri

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: rje btsun rdo rje sems bdag sngags //
analyzed: rje btsun rdo rje sems bdag sngags //
translated: The mantra of the venerable Vajrasattva

original: 'jigs byed dpa' bo dgra nag la //🔽btud de brgyud rim las rnyed pa //
analyzed: 'jigs byed dpa' bo dgra nag la // btud de brgyud rim las rnyed pa //
translated: To the hero Bhairava, the dark enemy,🔽Bowing, I will explain, for the sake of attaining powers,

original: dngos grub 'byung phyir bshad par bya //
analyzed: dngos grub 'byung phyir bshad par bya //
translated: What was found in the lineage stages.

original: rang gzugs rdzogs pa'i snying ga ru //
analyzed: rang gzugs rdzogs pa'i snying ga ru //
translated: In the heart of the complete form of oneself,

original: ya yig las ni 'gro bar sbyang //
analyzed: ya yig las ni 'gro bar sbyang //
translated: From the syllable ya, one should purify beings.

original: bdun po yis kyang sbyang byas nas //
analyzed: bdun po yis kyang sbyang byas nas //
translated: Having purified with the seven,

original: tshangs pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya //
translated: One should place them in the abode of Brahmā.

original: stong pa'i snying po gsal bar bsam //
analyzed: stong pa'i snying po gsal bar bsam //
translated: Visualize the clear essence of emptiness.

original: bsrung ba padmar ldan pa'i nang //
analyzed: bsrung ba padmar ldan pa'i nang //
translated: Inside the protection, endowed with a lotus,

original: chu skyes ri bong can rnon po //
analyzed: chu skyes ri bong can rnon po //
translated: The sharp moon-born lotus,

original: byang chub rgyu yi gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: byang chub rgyu yi gshin rje gshed //
translated: The cause of enlightenment, Yamāri,

original: rtsa ba'i zhal gyi khyad par can //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal gyi khyad par can //
translated: With the distinctive face of the root.

original: zhu ba'i thig le gyi yon tan bsam byas nas //
analyzed: zhu ba'i thig le gyi yon tan bsam byas nas //
translated: Having contemplated the quality of the melting drop,

original: bsod nams rgya cher rab tu bzlog pa brgyad kyis sku brgyan cing //
analyzed: bsod nams rgya cher rab tu bzlog pa brgyad kyis sku brgyan cing //
translated: His body is adorned with eight great reversals of great merit,🔽adorned with bones, pieces, and so forth.

original: rus pas brgyan cing dum bus dpal gshin rje bshed //🔽aindra n'i la @65a * //🔽lta bu ste //
analyzed: rus pas brgyan cing dum bus dpal gshin rje bshed // aindra n'i la @65a * // lta bu ste //
translated: He is like sapphire,

original: g-yas dang g-yon pa dkar dang dmar //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon pa dkar dang dmar //
translated: white on the right and red on the left.

original: phag mo de mtshungs dam 'khyud pa //
analyzed: phag mo de mtshungs dam 'khyud pa //
translated: Vārāhī is similar, embracing him.🔽His root hands hold a flaying knife and skull cup,

original: gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag / rdo rje bar dang tha ma gri //
analyzed: gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag / rdo rje bar dang tha ma gri //
translated: the vajra and the flaying knife in the middle and last,

original: gzhan na 'khor lo padma 'dzin //
analyzed: gzhan na 'khor lo padma 'dzin //
translated: and in the others, a wheel and lotus.

original: thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
translated: He has a head ornament of five skulls,

original: ser brdzes spyan dgu bzlog cing 'gyur //
analyzed: ser brdzes spyan dgu bzlog cing 'gyur //
translated: with tawny hair and three eyes, looking askance and wrathful.

original: lnga bcu'i do shal mnyam du dpyangs //
analyzed: lnga bcu'i do shal mnyam du dpyangs //
translated: He wears a garland of fifty fresh heads.

original: gdug pa brgyad kyis sku brgyan cing //
analyzed: gdug pa brgyad kyis sku brgyan cing //
translated: His body is adorned with the eight nāgas,

original: rus pas brgyan cing dum bus sgeg / mtshon cha bcu gnyis 'khrug par bsam //
analyzed: rus pas brgyan cing dum bus sgeg / mtshon cha bcu gnyis 'khrug par bsam //
translated: adorned with bones, pieces, and so forth, and is imagined as wrathful with the twelve ornaments.

original: ma he la bzhugs srid rtser 'bar //
analyzed: ma he la bzhugs srid rtser 'bar //
translated: He sits on a water buffalo, blazing at the peak of existence.🔽[Recite the following mantras:] for body, speech, mind, sense bases,

original: sku gsung thugs dang skye mched dang // dbang dang byin rlabs mchod dang bstod //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang skye mched dang // dbang dang byin rlabs mchod dang bstod //
translated: empowerment, consecration, offering, and praise.

original: bdud rtsi myong dang spro bsdu dang // bzlas pa'i rim pa'i man ngag las //
analyzed: bdud rtsi myong dang spro bsdu dang // bzlas pa'i rim pa'i man ngag las //
translated: on emanating and gathering, and on the stages of recitation,

original: shes pas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: shes pas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain power through knowledge.

original: aom k'a la r'u pa h'um /
analyzed: aom k'a la r'u pa h'um /
translated: Oṃ kālarūpa hūṃ

original: aom ya ma r'a dza /
analyzed: aom ya ma r'a dza /
translated: Oṃ yama rāja

original: sa do me ya /
analyzed: sa do me ya /
translated: Sado me ya

original: ya me do ru /🔽na yo da ya /
analyzed: ya me do ru / na yo da ya /
translated: Yama de ru🔽Na yo da ya

original: ya da yo ni /🔽ra ya kshe ya /
analyzed: ya da yo ni / ra ya kshe ya /
translated: Ya da yo ni🔽Ra ya kṣe ya🔽Ya kṣe ya tṣa

original: yakshe yatstsha / ni r'a ma ya /
analyzed: yakshe yatstsha / ni r'a ma ya /
translated: Ni rā ma ya

original: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śrīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: drug pas gtor ma bsnyen par bya //
analyzed: drug pas gtor ma bsnyen par bya //
translated: By the sixth [mantra] one should propitiate the bali

original: sum cu brgyad pas nye bar bsnyen //
analyzed: sum cu brgyad pas nye bar bsnyen //
translated: By the thirty-eighth [mantra] one should approach

original: bco lnga pas ni thams cad bsgrub //
analyzed: bco lnga pas ni thams cad bsgrub //
translated: By the fifteenth [mantra] one should accomplish everything

original: las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya //🔽gshed nag rgyud dang 'byung ba las //
analyzed: las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya // gshed nag rgyud dang 'byung ba las //
translated: And one should turn the wheel of action.🔽Having found it in the Black Yamāri Tantra and the Udbhava,

original: rnyed de sgrub thabs 'di bris pas //
analyzed: rnyed de sgrub thabs 'di bris pas //
translated: I wrote this sādhana.

original: blo ni rab dag gyur nas kyang //
analyzed: blo ni rab dag gyur nas kyang //
translated: May my mind become completely pure

original: gshin rje gshed du 'gyur bar shog / gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed du 'gyur bar shog / gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: And may I become Yamāntaka.

original: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The great master Śrī Dīpaṃkaraśrījñāna has completed this composition.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad do//
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad do//
translated: The yogi Prajñāśrījñānakīrti has made this self-translation.
